name: bgg-ludopedia-sync
description: Script para comparar coleções e partidas entre Ludopedia e BGG.

scripts.db:create: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const DbManager = require('./src/database/dbManager'); new DbManager().createTables().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1);})"
